params._resolutionTime: Block timestamp when market can be resolved

returns.isOpen: True if market status is OPEN

params._authorized: True to authorize, false to revoke

createMarket(string,uint256,address).notice: Create a new binary prediction market

getPosition(uint256,address).notice: Get user position in a market

getTradeHistory(uint256).notice: Get trade history for a market (for attribution)

isMarketOpen(uint256).notice: Check if market is open for trading

resolveMarket(uint256,uint8).notice: Resolve market to a specific outcome

setSmartAccountAuthorization(address,boo.notice: Authorize a smart account to trade

settlePosition(uint256,address).notice: Settle user positions after market resolution

trade(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Trade in a market (called by authorized smart accounts)
